DataListSpec.Name: Child Transfer Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Returns all Child Transfer Table records for the given child.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILD_TRANSFER_TABLE( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on;
select uct.[ID], uct.[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID], uct.[FORMCOMPLETIONDATE], uct.[FORMCOMPLETEDBY], uct.[FORMENTEREDBY], uct.[FIELDDATEOFTRANSFER], uct.[EXPLANATION], projectconst.LOOKUPID as FROMPROJECTLOOKUPID, uct.[CRMDATEOFTRANSFER], projectconst.LOOKUPID as TOPROJECTLOOKUPID, uct.DATEADDED from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so join dbo.USR_CHILDTRANSFER uct on so.ID = uct.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on uct.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_child.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID join dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION projectext on slocation.FIELDOFFICEID = projectext.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT projectconst ON projectconst.ID = projectext.ID where so.ID = @CONTEXTID
